channel.title: Important Audio
channel.description: RSS feed for important talks and lectures

item.title: Daniel Gross – How to Win
item.description:
Daniel Gross is an entrepreneur and investor.

Daniel was born in Israel. He founded a company called Cue, an AI-powered search engine. Cue raised multiple rounds of financing from Y-Combinator, Sequoia Capital, Index and others.

Watch on YouTube.

Timestamps

0:00 - Introduction: Input != Output
4:04 - Overview of How to Win: sleep, food, exercise, mind, and leadership
4:34 - Sleep
7:00 - Food
8:49 - Exercise
11:43 - Mind
18:44 - Leadership
28:43 - Closing thoughts
33:45 - Q&A session begins
33:52 - What goes wrong transitioning to the startup roller coaster
35:41 - How to minimize time spent online
36:59 - Startup mantras
38:05 - How to find community and peer support
39:57 - Does this have to suck?
41:05 - How to pivot
43:38 - Managing risk
45:28 - Coordination between co-founders


Links:

  • Sleep Like The Dead – recommendations to improve sleep quality
  • Melatonin: Much More than You Wanted to Know – source for 0.3 milligrams melatonin figure
  • How to Get Startup Ideas – Paul Graham's article on startup ideas
